title: Episode 99 - Pat Melgares Interview
itunes:title: Episode 99 - Pat Melgares Interview
description: In our latest interview we talk to Pat Melgares, a former All-American cross country runner turned author who tells us about his book "Chasing Excellence" a biography on Olympic Coach Joe Vigil. Pat tells us about how Coach Vigil chose the position as a running coach over more prestigious positions, and how he turned it into one of the longest running and most successful coaching careers. Hear all about the Vigilosophy of Coach Vigil in our latest episode.
